meanings.definition: The art or skill of writing by hand.
meanings.sent1: Her penmanship was so neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised his excellent penmanship.
meanings.sent3: His penmanship was so bad, it looked like chicken scratch!
meanings.sent4: Her penmanship was like a beautiful dance on paper.
meanings.sent5: The penmanship of the calligrapher was truly mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: I can recognize her penmanship anywhere.
meanings.sent2: The note's penmanship was difficult to read.
meanings.sent3: His messy penmanship made the letter hard to decipher.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant penmanship flowed like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The penmanship in the old diary was a window to the past.
